section.heading: Superintendent authorized to take over companies; grounds; procedure; liquidation; special agents and employees; rules and regulations; reports and bonds

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 7(b) of Insurance Omnibus Temporary Amendment Act of 1993 (D.C. Law 10-76, March 17, 1994, law notification 41 DCR 1626).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 10-76 and D.C. Law 10-103 purported to amend former § 35-419 1981 Ed. by rewriting (a)(4).
